name: Direct integrations, cloudquery, Serverless ReInvent
description:
On Thursday, March 16th, we will be meeting again at the Ohpen Barcelona headquarters to talk about **direct integration with api-gateway**, **cloudquery**, and the **latest serverless news from ReInvent** in Las Vegas, all accompanied by practical examples.
As always, at the end of the event, there will be a networking session with drinks and snacks offered by Ohpen.
We look forward to seeing you there!

name: Serverless IDP by Ohpen
description:
Hi serverless friends!
We're happy to announce a new event of our meetup on next Thursday 29th September!
This time we have a new speaker, Eduard Bargués from Ohpen, who will tell us how they created a 100% serverless IDP with on-demand environments in AWS!
Later with Adrian and Enric we'll talk a bit about Eventbrige and finally we'll have our networking time with food and drinks!
This time the event will be hosted by Ohpen, in their wonderful office in the city center!
We look forward for you

name: Serverless approach with Dapr / Save the Planet with Rust
description:
We're back with a couple of interesting presentations and demos!

* Dapr (Distributed Application Runtime), how it works, advantages, portability [Simone Zennaro]
* Save the Planet with Rust [Adrian Rico, Enric Soler]

After that, as usual, free aperitif in the Attico terrace!

name: Serverless on Kubernetes
description:
After a long (and weird period), we're back!
We're happy to announce a new Serverless Barcelona Meetup event on June 8th, at the wonderful Aticco offices, in front of the sea!
We'll talk about a common serverless stack reproduced in Kubernetes, and then we'll have a nice "networking time", in the terrace with an amazing view, a swimming pool and a good appetizer!

Agenda:
- 19:00 Check in
- 19:10 Simone Zennaro - Introduction to the meetup
- 19:15 Adrian Rico - What does it mean "serverless"?
- 19:25 Enric Soler + Adrian Rico - Serverless from AWS to K8S
- 19:45 Appetizer and networking on the terrace

name: Serverless Workshop 2/3
description:
Hi Serverless fans!
We are back! The second workshop (out of 3) will continue where the other left off and it's going to be even cooler...

This time we will co-organize the workshop with AWS Barcelona User Group! Thanks to this cooperation we will have a solution architect from AWS (Serhat Guelbetekin) that will introduce the services into more detail that we are using in the workshops and PoC!

Like last time we are happy that Fourthline will host this event and they will offer us good food and drinks after the workshop!

For those who didn't attend last time but would like to join: "Don't worry, we got you!" We are improving the documentation of the first workshop/PoC as we speak and will make it available for you here https://github.com/simone-zennaro/serverless-workshop-1 , to download the code from the repo and run it before the meetup!

A little glimpse of what is coming... We will be adding Firehose and Kinesis Analytics services to the PoC.

The agenda:
- 19:00 check-in (at Fourhtline offices)
- 19:10 Presentation
- 19:20 Kinesis Firehose & Analytics (Serhat Guelbetekin)
- 19:45 Serverless workshop
- 20:45 Food, drinks & networking

In order to move swiftly, take into account to:
- Bring your ID card / Passport: This is required to enter in the building.
- Bring your laptop (for the workshop!)

name: Serverless Workshop 1/3
description:
Hi friends!
Now summer is over YOU can join some great events again!
We will start a new series of meetups in a "talks & workshop" setting where we discuss some cool things in 3 different sessions!
In the first meeting (7th of November) we will talk about Cloud security (essential to our jobs!) and then we will start the first of three(!!) workshops about serverless.
In Fourthline (link: www.fourthline.com) we have found a great host for the event! They are located near Sants Station (on Calle Tarragona) and promised to offer us some good drinks and some nice food to keep the body and mind happy!
Fourthline made it their mission to disrupt online onboarding (KYC) with great tech and AI (not a lie!) to disrupt the old way of opening bank accounts and verifications.
Please join us then. We look forward in hosting yet another great event with you guys!!

Agenda:
- 19:00 check-in
- 19:15 Presentation
- 19:30 Cloud Security
- 19:45 Serverless workshop
- 20:45 Aperitif & networking

After you leave the building you will know how to:
- Create a static website
- Add a cognito user pool to authenticate users
- Create a protected rest-api to get data from a dynamodb table
- Automate the deploy of the stack through a bitbucket pipeline and the serverless.com framework.

Also note that we would need you to:
- Bring your laptop with nodejs and the serverless framework installed (https://serverless.com/)
- A Bitbucket account (mandatory)
- Communicate your name and surname (mandatory for the registration in the reception)
- An AWS account (not mandatory but preferible)

name: Serverless in real life
description:
Serverless is gaining more and more popularity because it lets you focus on your business problem versus working on your infrastructure, are you curious by serverless architectures?

Would you like to know how you could transform your current architecture or create your new project in serverless way?

Send us your use case and let us discuss it in a round table!
You can also specify to treat the your case anonymously.

Send your case to: [masked]

name: Serverless Race & Serverless Monitoring / Troubleshooting
description:
Don't miss the second Barcelona Serverless Meetup!
With Adrian Rico, Enric Soler Rastrollo and Ohad Bobrov we'll present an introduction to the serverless concept, a serverless benchmark test of different cloud providers and serverless monitoring / troubleshooting!
Aperitif offered by the organizers during the networking time!

name: First date!
description:
Por fin tenemos sitio y fecha!!!
Os esperamos en la preciosa sede de CAPSiDE en Plaza Catalunya el proximo 7 de Marzo para empezar esta comunidad de apasionados al cloud y a los servicios serverless.
Despues de las breves presenciaciones técnica y aprovechando el espacio ofrecido, ofreceremos a los asistentes un aperitivo dónde comentar experiencias y hacer un poco de networking!
